name: Hidden Expedition: New Adventures Steve and Victoria
storyline:
In each ancient civilization there is a hidden medallion. Find four medallions in order to find the Diamond Eye. It can make any wish come true.

Victoria and her best friend Steve are looking for adventure in the Far East. They are after the lost Atlantis and they have a map left from the grandfather.
summary:
In each ancient civilization there is a hidden medallion. Find four medallions in order to find the Diamond Eye. It can make any wish come true.

Victoria and her best friend Steve are looking for adventure in the Far East. They are after the lost Atlantis and they have a map left from the grandfather. Concentrate on the objects and pick up the right items to solve the exotic puzzle.
